name: Metal Fantasy Moon
description:
Irreverent deconstruction.
This is a light-hearted parody RPG with a few references to late 90's/early 00's culture - mostly of soap operas. It won't be to everyone's taste. It's quirky, it doesn't outstay its welcome and who knows, it might even illuminate something on the human condition (spoilers: it won't).
The game's been sitting pretty dormant for a while but I thought I might as well put it out there. Enjoy. PS, you will almost certainly need the RPGMaker2K font fix to read the text in the game. Get that from here: http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-sewers/downloads/rpg-maker-2000-font-patch
